header.title: CosNotifyChannelAdmin_ConsumerAdmin

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements the OMG CosNotifyChannelAdmin::ConsumerAdmin interface.

description.p:
To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosNotification/include/*.hrl").
This module also exports the functions described in:

desc.p: The ID returned by the creating channel is equal to the value encapsulated by this readonly attribute.
The creating channel's reference is maintained by this readonly attribute.

func.name: _get_MyOperator(ConsumerAdmin) -> OpType
func.fsummary: Return the filtering schema used by the target object

desc.p: When ConsumerAdmin's are created an operation type, i.e., 'AND_OP' or 'OR_OP', is supplied, which determines the semantics used by the target object concerning evaluation against any associated Filter objects.
If set, this operation returns the associated priority MappingFilter, otherwise a NIL object reference is returned.
To associate a priority MappingFilter with the target object this operation must be used.
Unless a lifetime MappingFilter have been associated with the target object a NIL object reference is returned by this operation.
This operation associate a lifetime MappingFilter with the target object.

func.name: _get_pull_suppliers(ConsumerAdmin) -> ProxyIDSeq
func.fsummary: Return a list of all associated pull supplier Id:s

desc.p: This readonly attribute maintains the Id's for all PullProxies created by the target object and still alive.

func.name: _get_push_suppliers(ConsumerAdmin) -> ProxyIDSeq
func.fsummary: Return a list of all associated push supplier Id:s

desc.p: This attribute is similar to the _get_pull_suppliers attribute but maintains the Id's for all PushProxies created by the target object and still alive.

func.name: get_proxy_supplier(ConsumerAdmin, ProxyID) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Return the proxy supplier with matching Id

desc.p: If a proxy with the given Id exists the reference to the object is returned, but if the object have terminated, or an incorrect Id is supplied, an exception is raised.
Determined by the parameter ConsumerType, a proxy which will accept events of the defined type is created. Along with the object reference an Id is returned.
This operation creates a new proxy which accepts #any{} events.
A proxy which accepts events of the type described by the parameter ConsumerType is created by this operation. A unique Id is returned as an out parameter.
The object created by this function is a proxy which accepts #any{} events.

func.name: destroy(ConsumerAdmin) -> ok
func.fsummary: Terminate the target object and all its children

desc.p: To terminate the target object this operation should be used. The associated Channel will be notified.
